def in_dining_room(faucet:item):
    # Function to check if a faucet is in the dining room
    symbol in_dining_room=exists room: item : is_dining_room(room) and inside(faucet, room)
    return in_dining_room

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists faucet: item : is_faucet(faucet) and in_dining_room(faucet) and not visited(faucet
):
            # If there is a faucet in the dining room and it hasnt been visited
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and in_dining_room(faucet) and not visited(faucet)
            achieve close_char(char, faucet)
        else:
            # If no unvisited faucet is found, initiate exploration
            foreach faucet: item:
                if is_faucet(faucet) and not visited(faucet):
                    observe(faucet,"Check if it is in the dining room")
